title: What is the main purpose of Backbone.js?

options.b: Providing structure to web applications and simplifying code
A core component for managing application data
A part of the user interface that displays data and listens for user events
A group of models that can be worked with as a single unit
A core component for managing application routes
The process of connecting models and views so that changes in one are reflected in the other
A way to create structured views with placeholders for data
A method for reading and writing data to and from the server

title: What is 'AMD' in the context of Backbone.js?

options.b: Asynchronous Module Definition, a way to load modules and manage dependencies
